channel.title: Commands (RSC)
channel.description: hey guys, Server is up, other people can connect from outside my LAN and registry is a success. The only problem is two commands which i really need, (::npc & ::item) neither of them work, and have not got a clue why. I have admin rank on the account I am using and have not gotten any results yet.

item.title: Commands (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @xAnonymous xAnonymous
item.description:
@xAnonymous wrote:

[quote=“liquidazer, post:9, topic:253904”]this is the code for item command

if(cmd.equals(“item”) && isAdmin(player, true))[/quote]

Rank 3 is admin on demonik.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“Jaghetermario, post:4, topic:253904”][quote author=~Kyle link=topic=335422.msg2609105#msg2609105 date=1230689053]
::npc (Then number)

Example:

::npc 55

Item (Id #) (Amount)

Example:

::item 1289 1

Edit: Yes ^, if you know where and how to find the CommandHandler, you can do it that way.
[/quote]

heey you smart rep+ for you, how to i do it?[/quote]
Failed attempt at trying to be funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

this is the code for item command

if(cmd.equals(“item”) && isAdmin(player, true))
{
int id = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
int amount = 1;

		if(args.length > 1)
			amount = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			
		if(!EntityHandler.getItemDef(id).isStackable())
			for(int i = 0; i < amount; i++)
				player.getInventory().add(new InvItem(id, amount));
		else 
			player.getInventory().add(new InvItem(id, amount));

		player.getActionSender().sendInventory();

I have the server up and running, which means that i have compiled the server sucessfully. I dunno what the hell is going on and its buggin me
and i am admin beacause i can ban people… wipebank accounts, set stats, take people to mod room, teleport. I set myself to rank: 30 if that is not admin please tell me

Read full topic

item.title: Commands (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @Jaghetermario Jaghetermario
item.description:
@Jaghetermario wrote:

[quote=“propker, post:6, topic:253904”]check ur command handler and make sure you have the command typed in right some sources dont use ::item or ::npc. ( i know i dont)

src>server>packethandler[/quote]

haha he just told you he knew about commad.java xD

And all the commands in demonik are working they all start with ::
and a little hint if they don’t work and are wrong coded you can’t compile the server;)
ANYWAY HAVE A GREAT NEW YEAR<3

Read full topic

the thing is when i try to spawn an item using the exact same command u just told me then nothing appears in my inventory. And yes i know of commandhandler, im not completely stupid -.- ive seen all the commands in the file and most of them dont work. it is the same with the npc command, the source i am using is demonik.
